abbie_talk1_zaine1.name: Zaine
text: You don't seem in a very good mood

abbie_talk1_zaine2.name: Zaine
text: I don't really know what a looper is... Sorry...

abbie_talk1_abbie2.name: Abbie
text: Loopers are the ones seeking the [rainbow freq=1.5, sat=1.5, val=1.5]ARTIFACT[/rainbow] at the bottom of the dungeon
Are you not here looking for [rainbow freq=1.5, sat=1.5, val=1.5]IT[/rainbow]?

abbie_talk1_zaine4.name: Zaine
text: But what did loopers do to you anyway?

abbie_talk1_abbie4.name: Abbie
text: You [tornado radius=7 freq=3.0]ALL[/tornado] come in here being [tornado radius=7 freq=3.0]nice[/tornado] and [tornado radius=7 freq=3.0]friendly[/tornado] and then you get [shake rate=20.0 level=15]WEIRD[/shake].
I'm tired of putting my emotions on the line just to be treated like that...

abbie_talk1_zaine5.name: Zaine
text: What do you mean by weird?

abbie_talk1_abbie5.name: Abbie
text: After a while they eventually come back chanting some strange stuff...
...And they try to steal or they attack me.
All without telling me what I did to deserve that.
Of course I can defend myself...
...But fighting back still makes me feel a certain way...

abbie_talk1_zaine6.name: Zaine
text: I don't really think that will happen to me though
Whatever it is I'm sure I can deal with it

abbie_talk1_abbie6.name: Abbie
text: Do you think that is the first time I hear that from someone, looper?

abbie_talk1_zaine7.name: Zaine
text: Why do you keep yourself here if you have to deal with that every day?

abbie_talk1_abbie7.name: Abbie
text: I just stay here because I make a [tornado radius=7 freq=3.0]loooooot[/tornado] of [color=yellow]money[/color]
I make low quality, simple to make weapons that break easily for a huge markup and loopers just eat them up
But yeah... I probably should get out of this place eventually...
It's hard to track time here but I think it's already been...

abbie_talk1_zaine9.name: Zaine
text: {dims} Dims on if I go insane or not

abbie_talk1_abbie9.name: Abbie
text: Maybe that'll reduce your chances of turning out like the others
